flags.title: Missing aether-utils.sh causes cascading failures
flags.description: If aether-utils.sh is missing or corrupted, error cascade with unclear recovery path. Error-handler recovery suggestions are generic rather than colony-specific.
flags.resolution: Acknowledged-existing: Error cascade handling is pre-existing architecture, not introduced in Phase 1. Will address in future error handling refactor.

flags.title: queen-read error handling could be clearer
flags.description: queen-read calls json_err and exits with code 1 when QUEEN.md is missing. The 2>/dev/null suppression may cause partial output to be misinterpreted as valid JSON.

flags.title: Malformed queen-promote JSON causes silent failures
flags.description: In seal.md and entomb.md, queen-promote output is piped to jq without proper error handling. If queen-promote fails and outputs non-JSON, jq parse errors are silently swallowed by 2>/dev/null, masking the root cause.

flags.title: queen-init failure silently discards wisdom
flags.description: In entomb.md Step 5.1, queen-init failures result in QUEEN.md not being created. Step 5.2 then skips all wisdom promotion without notifying the user. Validated learnings are silently lost.
